docs.snippet: The Mets celebrated the signing of Michael Conforto, its first-round draft pick, and also welcomed his agent, Scott Boras. The good feelings continued in a 7-1 win over the Marlins....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Mets celebrated the signing of Michael Conforto, its first-round draft pick, and also welcomed his agent, Scott Boras. The good feelings continued in a 7-1 win over the Marlins.
docs.abstract: New York Mets beat Miami Marlins, 7-1.

docs.snippet: Hiroki Kuroda, the only original starting pitcher for the Yankees who has not been sidelined with an injury, pitched well over all against the Orioles but gave away a two-run lead in a sloppy fourth inning....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hiroki Kuroda, the only original starting pitcher for the Yankees who has not been sidelined with an injury, pitched well over all against the Orioles but gave away a two-run lead in a sloppy fourth inning.
docs.abstract: Baltimore Orioles beat New York Yankees, 3-2, in 10 innings.

docs.snippet: It was another hustle play by Pete Rose, but this time even admirers began to suspect there was something off-kilter about him....
docs.lead_paragraph: It was another hustle play by Pete Rose, but this time even admirers began to suspect there was something off-kilter about him.
docs.abstract: Michael Beschloss History Source column recalls 1970 All-Star Game in which Pete Rose plowed into catcher Ray Fosse to score winning run in 12th inning; notes collision injured Fosse and raised questions about Rose's style of play.

headline.print_headline: The Night When Hustle Dimmed a Star
